lead_paragraph: Alando Tucker had 32 points and 10 rebounds and Brian Butch added a career-high 27 points as Wisconsin beat Pittsburgh on Saturday, snapping the Panthers' 21-game nonconference winning streak.
snippet: Alando Tucker had 32 points and 10 rebounds and Brian Butch added a career-high 27 points as Wisconsin beat Pittsburgh on Saturday, snapping the Panthers' 21-game nonconference winning streak.
